We load data from a dropbox account

This workflow is only available till 31.12.2023. After that, you have to use
the Main.RMD file.

```{r}

tempdir()
tempfile(pattern = '', fileext = '.csv')
unlink()


# create a temporary folder
dir.create( "../data/dropbox" )

download.file('https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/hq9vv6tddvk39gxeo5n92/Messnetz_2023_MF_230624.csv?rlkey=snoems2khfweuosviyz2nn4na&dl=1', 
              "../data/dropbox//Messnetz_2023_MF_230624.csv" )

# Read the file
dat2 <- read.csv( "../data/dropbox/Messnetz_2023_MF_230624.csv" )

# deletes downloaded file
file.remove( "../data/dropbox/Messnetz_2023_MF_230624.csv" )

# deletes entire directory
unlink( "../data/dropbox", recursive = TRUE )
```
